performance and superior quality.
As one of the premier structure providers in the country,
Solar can build any type of custom structure for both
residential and commercial applications.
Skylights are a staple product at Solar Innovations
With our superior structure knowledge we create some of
the best openings from above in the market.

Tests and Certifications


COMMERCIAL

Solar Innovations® specializes in providing high quality commercial products for a variety of types of businesses. From single Terrace Doors to expansive Glass Structures, Solar has you covered in so many ways. Our operable walls can create a dynamic storefront, lobby, or restaurant space that draws visitors in, and skylights or curtain walls provide inviting natural light that can improve customer satisfaction. Your lobby or work space area isn’t complete without one of our systems. Whether a restaurant, office space, retail store, hotel, sport venue, or educational or institutional facility, our high quality systems can improve any commercial space.


RESIDENTIAL

Residential applications can range from simplistic modern style to traditional English structures with a full set of decorative accessories. Solar Innovations® is your single source provider for all your residential Door & Window, Glass Structure, and Skylight needs, with the ability to fully customize any project. We offer Complete Glazing Packages that keep sightlines, finishes, and glazing warranties consistent. While other manufacturers say no, Solar says yes. We believe there isn’t a dream too big or small for your next home project. We can work directly with homeowners, architects, professional builders, contractors, or dealers and we can give you the products you need for your project to succeed.

Aluminum

Aluminum products are some of the strongest in the industry. Every product line from Solar is available in durable aluminum. Aluminum is also recognized for its sustainable nature, ability to support larger sizes and in addition, durability and longevity compared to other materials.  We provide Doors & Windows, Glass Structures, and Skylights in aluminum.

Vinyl-Composite

Vinyl-composite is another versatile option for Doors & Windows. Vinyl-composite is a naturally thermally efficient material, allowing our products to reach higher energy codes and reduce heating and cooling costs. Similar to aluminum, vinyl-composite framing is durable and requires no constant finish maintenance.

Solid Wood

The warmth and beauty of solid wood can complement any home or commercial space. Solid wood is available in a variety of species and finishes on select Door & Window, Structure, and Skylight products. For products that will come into direct contact with the elements, durable aluminum cladding is available for the exterior.

Wood Cladding & Veneering

For those interested in combining the strength of aluminum or vinyl-composite and the natural beauty of a wood interior, wood cladding and veneering are a great choice. Wood cladding is a thick wood cap on the interior, while wood veneering is a thin layer of wood; both options provide the beauty of real wood and the longevity of an aluminum or vinyl-composite product.

Made in America

All our products are designed and manufactured in the United States at our state-of-the-art facility in Pine Grove, PA.

 

Coastal Applications

Our systems have the option to be both coastal and non-coastal. Because we use stainless steel hardware, our materials withstand the corrosive effects of the elements in these coastal regions.

Hurricane Impact Rated

Our company currently offers the largest selection of products tested for Florida ratings. As a result, the products withstand even the most extreme weather conditions.

Monstrous Sizes

Solar Innovations® has the ability to manufacture even larger panels that operate with greater ease for several functions: folding, sliding, swinging, and stacking.

Thermally Enhanced

The thermal break separates the aluminum and minimizes conductivity of heat and cold from the inside to the outside while ensuring the structure’s interior remains comfortable at any time of year.

Custom Engineered

Each Solar Innovations® system is custom made to order based on your project needs and preferences. Therefore, our team of engineering experts has you covered.

Ease of Operation

Solar Innovations®‘ systems offer single-handed operation resulting in smooth movement with little effort. Because much of our hardware is manufactured in-house, we have greater control of lead times.

Vertical Integration

In addition to manufacturing our products, we also make many components for our hardware. This allows us to better control lead times and as a result, help serve our customers better.

Glass Variety

Solar Innovations® has top of the line glazing solutions which include laminated, dual glazed, triple glazed, and marine glazed options just to name a few.

Sustainable Products

Solar’s products are manufactured with outstanding thermal performance, durable framework, and sustainable materials, therefore making it a great option for your next project.

Screen Options

Screen options are available on a wide variety of our door and window products. These screen options help keep the pests at bay still allowing you to view the outdoors.

Multiple Styles

Solar Innovations® manufactures the highest quality glazed structures custom designed and engineered to match individual customers’ needs while having a large variety of styles to choose from.

Single Source Provider

At Solar Innovations® Architectural Glazing Systems, we are always innovating new products and technologies while serving dealers, architects, and homeowners in the architectural building materials community. We provide high-end products that are sustainable and also increase the efficiency of either a residential home, commercial building, and high-end resort. Crafted with precision and quality, our products enhance the richness of any lifestyle, and also bring the outdoors in while keeping the harsh elements out.

As your single source provider of Residential and Commercial products we provide: Stacking Glass Walls, Folding Glass Walls, Multi-Stacking Doors, Multi-Pocket Doors, Lift Slide Doors, Sliding Glass Doors, Pivot Doors, Terrace Doors, Sunrooms, Greenhouses, Conservatories, Skylights, Wood and Aluminum Curtain Walls, Tilt Turns, Doors, Windows, Glass Railings in addition to many other products. Furthermore, we are confident we can the suit the needs of any situation for your next project.

We offer complete solutions to fit your needs in our Doors & Windows, Glass Structures, and Skylights. Our products create open environments that give an awe factor to any home or commercial building, while increasing natural light and reducing utility costs. Contact us today for a free quote.

Connect with Us!

Solar Innovations® has succeeded by listening to its customers and delivering a complete line of high performance structures and accessories including doors, windows, ridge vents, and more. Solar resides in a state-of-the art 220,000 sq. ft. corporate office and manufacturing facility that is part of a three-building campus with over 325,000 sq.ft. of manufacturing space, located on 36+ acres in Pine Grove, PA, and employs over 170 team members.

Pine Grove, Pennsylvania

1-800-618-0669

31 Roberts Road
Pine Grove, Pennsylvania 17963
